original_title: The Official Review of UEFA Euro 2004
overview: This is the official review of the UEFA 2004 European Championships and what a tournament it has been.  From the very first game there was high drama with the hosts suffering a surprise defeat to Greece. In Group B England looked to have defeated the French until the final minutes when the magic feet of Zidane scored not once but twice. Group C went down to the wire, Sweden and Denmark needed to draw 2-2 for both teams to make the Quarter Finals and put Italy out of the competition.  It couldn't possibly happen... but it did.  Group D was expected to be hotly contested and it produced arguably the best game of the tournament when the Czech Republic came back from two goals down to defeat the Dutch 3-2.
title: The Official Review of UEFA Euro 2004
